# About this Project

This repository accompanies the article:

**Costa, W.G., et al. (2025). Genetic diversity and interaction between the maintainers of commercial Soybean cultivars using selfing. *Crop Science*.**  
DOI: [10.1002/csc2.20816](https://doi.org/10.1002/csc2.20816)

The project provides a **fully reproducible workflow** implemented in **R**, combining:

- **Random Forest** for variable selection  
- **Multiple Correspondence Analysis (MCA)** for dimensionality reduction  
- **Self-Organizing Maps (SOM)** for clustering maintainers of soybean cultivars  
- **Visualization tools** to interpret genetic diversity and interaction patterns  

All scripts, data, and outputs are organized to ensure **transparency, reproducibility, and open science**.
